title: Visa-free travel to China for 30 days? New agreement announced for UK travellers after Keir Starmer’s Beijing trip
summary_full: China will allow British citizens visa-free entry for 30 days for tourism and business. This significant agreement was announced during Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer's visit to Beijing. The move aims to boost people-to-people ties and facilitate easier travel for tourists and business leaders. This development signals a potential reset in bilateral relations between the UK and China.
